title: Google vs. Nvidia: Big Tech Polymarket predictions
title_zh: 谷歌 vs. Nvidia：大型科技 Polymarket 预测
summary: Slatestone Wealth chief market strategist Kenny Polcari, FL Putnam Investment Management Co.
summary_zh: Slatestone Wealth 首席市场策略师 Kenny Polcari，FL Putnam Investment Management Co.

title: Analysis-Is chip giant ASML about to hit a ceiling, or break through it?
title_zh: 分析——芯片巨头ASML即将触顶天花板，还是突破天花板？
summary: ASML's latest results reignited the rally that has made it Europe's most valuable company, until questions about its capacity to meet record orders sent the stock sliding - highlighting just how stretched ​expectations have become.
summary_zh: ASML 的最新业绩重新点燃了涨势，使其成为欧洲最有价值的公司，直到对其满足创纪录订单的能力的质疑导致该股下跌 - 凸显了预期已经变得多么高。

title: US software stocks slide after SAP, ServiceNow results fuel AI disruption fears
title_zh: SAP、ServiceNow 业绩引发人工智能颠覆担忧，美国软件股下跌
summary: U.S. software stocks fell on Thursday after SAP's cautious cloud outlook and a post-earnings drop in ServiceNow ​shares reinforced investor concerns about mounting competition from artificial intelligence-related ‌companies.
summary_zh: SAP 谨慎的云前景以及 ServiceNow 股价在盈利后下跌，加剧了投资者对人工智能相关公司竞争加剧的担忧，美国软件股周四下跌。

title: Caterpillar gets a big AI sales boost as tariffs drag
title_zh: 由于关税拖累，卡特彼勒人工智能销量大幅增长
summary: By Abhinav Parmar and Nathan Gomes Jan 29 (Reuters) - Caterpillar's fourth-quarter results mirrored the global economy, with sales lifted by surging artificial intelligence-related spending even as
summary_zh: 作者：Abhinav Parmar 和 Nathan Gomes 1 月 29 日（路透社）——卡特彼勒第四季度业绩反映了全球经济的情况，尽管人工智能相关支出激增，但销售额仍有所增长

title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq sink as Microsoft's post-earnings plunge drags tech down
title_zh: 今日股市：道琼斯指数、标准普尔 500 指数和纳斯达克指数均下跌，因微软财报后暴跌拖累科技股下跌
summary: Wall Street is in the middle of Big Tech earnings, with Apple the next 'Magnificent Seven' member set to report.
summary_zh: 华尔街正处于大型科技公司财报的中期，苹果公司将成为下一个“七巨头”的成员。

title: Microsoft stock falls around CapEx spending concerns: Earnings
title_zh: 微软股价因资本支出担忧而下跌：收益
summary: Microsoft (MSFT) reported fiscal second quarter results, with adjusted earnings of $5.16 per share and revenue figures ($81.27 billion vs. estimates of $80.31 billion) that topped Wall Street expectations.
summary_zh: 微软 (MSFT) 公布了第二财季业绩，调整后每股收益为 5.16 美元，营收数据（812.7 亿美元，预期为 803.1 亿美元）超出了华尔街预期。

title: Tesla's Optimus 3 will 'move the needle' for US GDP: Elon Musk
title_zh: 埃隆·马斯克：特斯拉的 Optimus 3 将“推动”美国 GDP
summary: Tesla (TSLA) released fourth quarter results after Wednesday's market close, reporting adjusted earnings of $0.50 per share compared to estimates of $0.45 and revenue of $24.90 billion versus estimates of $25.11 billion.In Wednesday's earnings call, Tesla CEO Elon Musk expande...
summary_zh: 特斯拉 (TSLA) 在周三收盘后发布了第四季度业绩，报告调整后每股收益为 0.50 美元，而预期为 0.45 美元；营收为 249 亿美元，而预期为 251.1 亿美元。

title: Hot takes: Tesla, Meta, and Microsoft quarters are wildly different
title_zh: 热门观点：特斯拉、Meta 和微软季度截然不同
summary: Not all tech quarters should be look at in the same light.
summary_zh: 并非所有科技领域都应该以同样的眼光来看待。

title: What are share buybacks?
summary: A share repurchase, or share buyback, is when a company rebuys its own shares and returns money to its investors.
summary_zh: 股票回购是指公司回购自己的股票并将资金返还给投资者。
